chapter.text: sad wal-qur'ani dhi l-dhik'ri
bali alladhina kafaru fi ʿizzatin washiqaqin
kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin fanadaw walata hina manasin
waʿajibu an jaahum mundhirun min'hum waqala l-kafiruna hadha sahirun kadhabun
ajaʿala l-alihata ilahan wahidan inna hadha lashayon ʿujabun
wa-intalaqa l-mala-u min'hum ani im'shu wa-is'biru ʿala alihatikum inna hadha lashayon yuradu
ma samiʿ'na bihadha fi l-milati l-akhirati in hadha illa ikh'tilaqun
a-unzila ʿalayhi l-dhik'ru min baynina bal hum fi shakkin min dhik'ri bal lamma yadhuqu ʿadhabi
am ʿindahum khazainu rahmati rabbika l-ʿazizi l-wahabi
am lahum mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma falyartaqu fi l-asbabi
jundun ma hunalika mahzumun mina l-ahzabi
kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin waʿadun wafir'ʿawnu dhu l-awtadi
wathamudu waqawmu lutin wa-ashabu al'aykati ulaika l-ahzabu
in kullun illa kadhaba l-rusula fahaqqa ʿiqabi
wama yanzuru haulai illa sayhatan wahidatan ma laha min fawaqin
waqalu rabbana ʿajjil lana qittana qabla yawmi l-hisabi
is'bir ʿala ma yaquluna wa-udh'kur ʿabdana dawuda dha l-aydi innahu awwabun
inna sakharna l-jibala maʿahu yusabbih'na bil-ʿashiyi wal-ish'raqi
wal-tayra mahshuratan kullun lahu awwabun
washadadna mul'kahu waataynahu l-hik'mata wafasla l-khitabi
wahal ataka naba-u l-khasmi idh tasawwaru l-mih'raba
idh dakhalu ʿala dawuda fafaziʿa min'hum qalu la takhaf khasmani bagha baʿduna ʿala baʿdin fa-uh'kum baynana bil-haqi wala tush'tit wa-ih'dina ila sawai l-sirati
inna hadha akhi lahu tis'ʿun watis'ʿuna naʿjatan waliya naʿjatun wahidatun faqala akfil'niha waʿazzani fi l-khitabi

qala laqad zalamaka bisuali naʿjatika ila niʿajihi wa-inna kathiran mina l-khulatai layabghi baʿduhum ʿala baʿdin illa alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati waqalilun ma hum wazanna dawudu annama fatannahu fa-is'taghfara rabbahu wakharra rakiʿan wa-anaba
faghafarna lahu dhalika wa-inna lahu ʿindana lazul'fa wahus'na maabin

yadawudu inna jaʿalnaka khalifatan fi l-ardi fa-uh'kum bayna l-nasi bil-haqi wala tattabiʿi l-hawa fayudillaka ʿan sabili l-lahi inna alladhina yadilluna ʿan sabili l-lahi lahum ʿadhabun shadidun bima nasu yawma l-hisabi
wama khalaqna l-samaa wal-arda wama baynahuma batilan dhalika zannu alladhina kafaru fawaylun lilladhina kafaru mina l-nari
am najʿalu alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati kal-muf'sidina fi l-ardi am najʿalu l-mutaqina kal-fujari
kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakun liyaddabbaru ayatihi waliyatadhakkara ulu l-albabi
wawahabna lidawuda sulaymana niʿ'ma l-ʿabdu innahu awwabun
idh ʿurida ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi l-safinatu l-jiyadu
faqala inni ahbabtu hubba l-khayri ʿan dhik'ri rabbi hatta tawarat bil-hijabi
rudduha ʿalayya fatafiqa mashan bil-suqi wal-aʿnaqi
walaqad fatanna sulaymana wa-alqayna ʿala kur'siyyihi jasadan thumma anaba
qala rabbi igh'fir li wahab li mul'kan la yanbaghi li-ahadin min baʿdi innaka anta l-wahabu
fasakharna lahu l-riha tajri bi-amrihi rukhaan haythu asaba
wal-shayatina kulla bannain waghawwasin
waakharina muqarranina fi l-asfadi
hadha ʿatauna fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri hisabin
wa-inna lahu ʿindana lazul'fa wahus'na maabin
wa-udh'kur ʿabdana ayyuba idh nada rabbahu anni massaniya l-shaytanu binus'bin waʿadhabin
ur'kud birij'lika hadha mugh'tasalun baridun washarabun
wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamith'lahum maʿahum rahmatan minna wadhik'ra li-uli l-albabi
wakhudh biyadika digh'than fa-id'rib bihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiran niʿ'ma l-ʿabdu innahu awwabun
wa-udh'kur ʿibadana ib'rahima wa-is'haqa wayaʿquba uli l-aydi wal-absari
inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatin dhik'ra l-dari
wa-innahum ʿindana lamina l-mus'tafayna l-akhyari
wa-udh'kur is'maʿila wal-yasaʿa wadha l-kif'li wakullun mina l-akhyari
hadha dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqina lahus'na maabin
jannati ʿadnin mufattahatan lahumu l-abwabu
muttakiina fiha yadʿuna fiha bifakihatin kathiratin washarabin
waʿindahum qasiratu l-tarfi atrabun
hadha ma tuʿaduna liyawmi l-hisabi
inna hadha lariz'quna ma lahu min nafadin
hadha wa-inna lilttaghina lasharra maabin
jahannama yaslawnaha fabi'sa l-mihadu
hadha falyadhuquhu hamimun waghassaqun
waakharu min shaklihi azwajun
hadha fawjun muq'tahimun maʿakum la marhaban bihim innahum salu l-nari
qalu bal antum la marhaban bikum antum qaddamtumuhu lana fabi'sa l-qararu
qalu rabbana man qaddama lana hadha fazid'hu ʿadhaban diʿ'fan fi l-nari
waqalu ma lana la nara rijalan kunna naʿudduhum mina l-ashrari
attakhadhnahum sikh'riyyan am zaghat ʿanhumu l-absaru
inna dhalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahli l-nari
qul innama ana mundhirun wama min ilahin illa l-lahu l-wahidu l-qaharu
rabbu l-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma l-ʿazizu l-ghafaru
qul huwa naba-on ʿazimun
antum ʿanhu muʿ'riduna
ma kana liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i l-aʿla idh yakhtasimuna
in yuha ilayya illa annama ana nadhirun mubinun
idh qala rabbuka lil'malaikati inni khaliqun basharan min tinin
fa-idha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fihi min ruhi faqaʿu lahu sajidina
fasajada l-malaikatu kulluhum ajmaʿuna
illa ib'lisa is'takbara wakana mina l-kafirina
qala yaib'lisu ma manaʿaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina l-ʿalina
qala ana khayrun min'hu khalaqtani min narin wakhalaqtahu min tinin
qala fa-ukh'ruj min'ha fa-innaka rajimun
wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnati ila yawmi l-dini
qala rabbi fa-anzir'ni ila yawmi yub'ʿathuna
qala fa-innaka mina l-munzarina
ila yawmi l-waqti l-maʿlumi
qala fabiʿizzatika la-ugh'wiyannahum ajmaʿina
illa ʿibadaka min'humu l-mukh'lasina
qala fal-haqu wal-haqa aqulu
la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿina
qul ma asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wama ana mina l-mutakalifina
in huwa illa dhik'run lil'ʿalamina
walataʿlamunna naba-ahu baʿda hinin
